description: The house was built in 2017 by the owners using the best qualities since it was going to be their primary home. It is located in the Nuevo Baztán area, very close to the town and all its services. The house has 166 meters built on 2 floors. From the entrance we access the living room of more than 30 meters with fireplace.On the main floor, we also have 2 double bedrooms, a bathroom with a bathtub also connected to the master bedroom, and the kitchen with a large pantry. On the upper floor, the attic, is perfectly utilized with a common area and 2 double bedrooms with a large dressing room and a bathroom with a shower. Regarding the qualities of the home: - The tilt-and-turn windows are made of PVC with very thick double glazed windows in chestnut color, with blinds and mosquito nets. - The floor is made of AC5/33 MAMMUT type flooring (German brand), which offers the highest wear resistance. - The heating system is using a PELLET boiler which manages to keep the house warm with maximum savings. - The railing leading up to the attic is made of glass with stainless steel. - The hot water works through SOLAR PANELS and there is also a bypass in case it is necessary. - The entrance door to the house is armored. - The windows are large and give a lot of light to the house. - It has large built-in wardrobes in the bedrooms and living room. - LED spotlights in all the ceilings of the bedrooms and bathrooms. - Sliding doors to make more use of space. - Exit to the back porch from the kitchen. - The stairs are made of marble. The plot has 920 meters very well used and distributed: - Closed garage with automatic door for one car. - Front porch. - The house is surrounded by a sidewalk with cobblestones. - Natural grass with automatic irrigation on the side. - There is an exterior tank built to store rainwater and thus use it for irrigation. - Orchard area. - Storage room and full bathroom with shower. - Barbecue and sink for summer days. - The façade is made of SATE (Exterior Thermal Insulation System) which consists of the placement of various construction elements in order to achieve optimal thermal insulation, both cold and heat. IF YOU WANT MORE INFORMATION OR TO MAKE A VISIT, CONTACT US, IF YOU NEED IT WE WILL HELP YOU WITH FINANCING.[IW].

ORBIS ALIA presents this magnificent independent villa in the Mirador Nuevo Baztán Urbanization. We present this beautiful independent villa, ideal for families! The chalet has a large plot with large trees. Once inside the house, we find a hall that distributes the ground floor into two large areas. The most public part has a large dining room, with windows facing two directions (east-west), and once we cross this large space, we find a second, more intimate dining room, linked to the kitchen. The kitchen is very large and has an office area, a large pantry and direct access to the garden. On the other hand we find the ground floor area intended for a more private use, where we find 5 bedrooms, an office and 2 full bathrooms. This area could be redistributed without much effort to create a smaller number of bedrooms with greater amplitude, since there are no structural elements that are inside the house, but only on the facades. The upper floor is divided into two areas. The first, like the ground floor, has 2 bedrooms and a full bathroom. The second is a large room that now functions as a games room and will delight the little ones, or it can be converted into a living-study area. The chalet was renovated and extended in 1993, so it would be enough to update a few things to make it the chalet of your dreams. Solar panels were recently installed, so electricity consumption is reduced to around €15/month. The Mirador de Baztán urbanization has common areas, sports facilities, swimming pool, club, restaurant... all this included in the 94 euros that are paid monthly as a community. The urbanization is a perfect place for families, where children can enjoy life in nature but with the comforts provided by quality sports facilities. If you think that this can become the house of your dreams, do not hesitate and call us without obligation. We will wait for you! Call us or write us by whatsapp. Orbis Alia: 644 719 748 / 644 730 426.

description: Alcalá Inmobiliaria, sells a wonderful independent villa, on one floor in Eurovillas-Las Villas de Nuevo Baztan. 992 m2 plot, according to cadastre, with a built-in swimming pool and child safety fencing, with an underground treatment plant; large garden areas with fruit trees, pines, firs and other trees, which allow us to enjoy the natural environment, and other garden areas, which are paved; It also has a built-in barbecue, a metal surface storage room to store belongings and boiler and diesel tank rooms outside. It has a basement 1.50 m2 high and approximately 80 m2 in area, which is used as storage for the home; It also has a large parking lot inside the plot. With many possibilities! ; In very good condition! , Very good distribution. The house consists of a covered porch of approximately 25 m2, 4 bedrooms, totally exterior, large living room with separate dining room with built-in fireplace, kitchen furnished with vitro, hood, washing machine, refrigerator and dishwasher with exit door to the plot; full bathroom and toilet with windows. Floating flooring and stoneware floors, individual oil heating. Bars throughout the house. Smooth paint in bedrooms. Completely exterior, very bright and views of the magnificent plot. Very well preserved and recently painted. Better see! It has access from the R-2 and M-204 highway and from the R-3 and M-209 highway, with all types of public services, schools, a preschool, close to supermarkets, shops, green sports and leisure areas, as well as as places of historical interest and a few meters from the bus stops, lines 261, 260 and 321. The meters of the house are contrasted according to cadastre/registry. This announcement is not binding and may contain errors. It is shown for informational purposes and is not contractual. The sales prices do not include legal taxes or deed expenses.

Large two-story villa ideal for a large family seeking a certain independence, since each of its floors has a complete home. It has 250 m2 built housing. We access the ground floor from an entrance porch facing south.From it there is access to a multifunction room independent from the rest, ideal for setting up an office or a gym, and through another door to the house.In it we find a very bright dining room and a distributor chaired by a beautiful wooden staircase. Living room with fireplace, fitted kitchen, 1 bathroom and three bedrooms with wardrobes complete this floor. On the first floor we discover a dining room, a brand new fitted kitchen, 1 full bathroom and 3 bedrooms, one of them with a fireplace, which can also be a living room. You will enjoy a 1057 m2 plot located in a very quiet and central street of the Las Villas de Nuevo Baztán Urbanization, with a built-in pool, large trees, shrubs and rockeries that create a very pleasant garden.You will also have two parking areas and a garage for your vehicles, a greenhouse, barbecue, several storage rooms and an outside toilet. A very complete property with many possibilities that a large family like yours awaits.

WE DO NOT CHARGE THE PURCHASING PARTY! Save from the beginning: No reforms, ready to move into. 4 bedrooms and 2 full bathrooms on one floor, kitchen with island, garage and laundry area, 1400m2 plot, porch and air conditioning! Discover this charming detached villa on one level, recently renovated, located in the quiet urbanization of Las Villas, in Nuevo Baztán.With a generous plot of almost 1,500 m², this property offers you a quiet and spacious home. Upon entering, and after passing the hall, you will decide whether to enter the kitchen or the living room, although later these communicate fluidly with the dining room, responding to the modern open concept, so fashionable. This kitchen is served by an island for maximum comfort and company while cooking: a dream for those people who enjoy sharing gastronomic moments with friends and family.It also has direct access to the rear terrace and the entire rear plot, where the pool is currently located, perfect for enjoying the outdoors and moments of relaxation and fun. The house, all on one floor, has 4 bedrooms and 2 full bathrooms.All rooms are equipped with fitted wardrobes, bars and blinds on the windows for your safety and peace of mind. You will also find a room dedicated to the washer/dryer that isolates the noise of the living machines.Heating and hot water work through a brand new, modern diesel boiler in a separate outside boiler room. The plot offers a combination of green areas, including natural grass, artificial grass, screed floor and decorative stone, which will greatly relieve you of the work necessary to keep the farm in excellent condition. I do not want to ignore the practical and comfortable front porch, ideal for enjoying the shade during the sunniest days. The urbanization is only 45 minutes from Madrid, with easy access from both the A2 and the A3.In addition, it offers a wide range of services for the whole family, such as primary and secondary schools, bilingual schools, a health center, pharmacy, summer pool and modern sports facilities that include paddle tennis, football and basketball courts.You will also find supermarkets, post office, hardware stores, workshops, fashion stores and a variety of catering establishments. It has 3 bus lines 321, 260 and 261, connecting with Madrid and Arganda. In an enclave of Natural Area and belonging to the municipality of Nuevo Baztán, recently included in the list of the "Most Beautiful Municipalities in Spain". Do not miss the opportunity to acquire this renovated house in a privileged location.Contact us right now to arrange a visit and discover all the wonders that this property and the area have to offer!

description: Renovated house for sale with four bedrooms and three bathrooms. We access from a glazed porch perfect as a cloakroom or living room. Next we find the bedrooms, living room and kitchen all on one floor. The living room has a fireplace and is attached to the kitchen, which makes it very comfortable and allows you to enjoy all the space. It has a bar or serving hatch ideal for meetings and to create various environments. The bedrooms have built-in wardrobes and the main one has a bathroom. The fourth bedroom is used as an office, large and in the other wing of the house. Outside we have paved and garden areas, all finished with details and beautiful trees. Roof for four cars. Covered porch with a large bathroom and bar counter, pergola with stone table and the magnificent pool. A luxury to enjoy the surroundings and tranquility that the urbanization offers all year round. 20 minutes from Alcalá de Henares and A-2. We have two schools, a shopping center and all services in a unique enclave.

420m² villa built in Las Villas Urbanization and a 1,200m² plot. The house has two floors, with 191m² on the ground floor and 163m² on the upper floor. It has 6 bedrooms (two on the ground floor and four on the upper floor) and 4 complete bathrooms (two with shower and two with bathtub). The main room has a terrace and dressing room, as well as two independent bathrooms. The house has: -Garage on the ground floor of 52m² - Facility room where the diesel boiler is located (water and heating) - Laundry room - Woodshed/storage room - Outdoor oven - Round construction pool and pump room - Bars on ground floor windows - AA/CC with heat pump in the living room and in the four bedrooms on the upper floor - Closed access porch to the house with pedestrian access to the garage - Store.

Are you looking for a comfortable house? Do you want to live close to all services? We offer you EXCLUSIVELY this little house in the town of Nuevo Baztán. It is perfect to move into. The SINGLE-FAMILY home has 80 meters on one floor and a 30-meter CORNER front garden. It consists of 3 bedrooms, all of them DOUBLE and with BUILT-IN WARDROBES and a full bathroom with a bathtub. It also has a separate laundry area, which can easily be converted into a second bathroom. The living room has a fireplace and the kitchen is fully equipped with access to another backyard with a direct door to the countryside. The floors are stoneware and it has large wooden windows in all rooms, taking advantage of all the outside light. The hot water works with a recently installed electric water heater and the heating works through a diesel boiler. Both the roof and the ground floor of the house are fixed and you can see that it has all the optimal qualities to live without worrying about anything. The house is located a few meters from the medical center, the pharmacy, the supermarket, the sports area and has good access to the main road of the town. Nuevo Baztán is listed as one of the most beautiful towns in Spain and Villas in Madrid, with a beautiful architectural complex. Both the town and the urbanization have supermarkets, two schools, two shopping centers, sports courts, maintenance service (conservation entity), cultural house with library, auditorium room and multiple activities. The municipality has a doctor's office, supermarkets, local police, municipal swimming pool, gas station, industrial estate. All this surrounded by a fantastic natural environment and quick access to Alcalá de Henares, Torrejón de Ardoz, Rivas and Madrid thanks to the connection with the A2 and A3 motorways, as well as the option of the R3 for direct access to the heart of the city. from Madrid. [IW].

Villa located in the Monteacevedo urbanization of Nuevo Baztán. With a corner plot of 2797 m2 that overlooks two streets with independent entrances and the possibility of putting a totally independent mobile home. With many trees and several booths as storage rooms and a greenhouse. It has running water and perfectly legalized well water. We also find a large vegetable gazebo with a barbecue and a wood-burning oven. The house has 160 m2 built in the year 80. It consists of an entrance porch, a dining room and a living room, each with an iron stove, a fitted kitchen, 4 bedrooms and 1 full bathroom. Annex and independent of the house, it also has a garage for 1 car. We remain at your disposal for further information on the property.

Villa for sale in the Villas de Nuevo Baztán. Just 45km from Madrid center. Comfortable villa distributed on one floor, a 1000m² plot with a swimming pool, a glazed porch with a fireplace, an independent space with multiple possibilities, a built-in house where the washing machine is located, and a roof for vehicles with storage space. The house has an entrance hall, living room with access to the outside of the plot and an American kitchen. It has 3 bedrooms, the main one has a fully dressed built-in wardrobe. And large bathroom with shower. Large plot, with paved areas and space for a garden. The Las Villas urbanization does not have a Community fee. The maintenance of the urbanization is the responsibility of the Nuevo Baztán city council. It has a bus stop at its entrance.

Impressive one-story villa, with 185m2 built and on a plot of more than 1000m2, it is a true gem that offers a unique lifestyle. With 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms (one of them a suite incorporated into the master bedroom), 3 living rooms and an impressive kitchen with an office, as well as a swimming pool, this property has everything you need to enjoy to the fullest. When accessing the plot through its automatic gate, on the left you find a covered parking space for 5 cars. The tour of the house begins in a spectacular porch converted into a living room, which serves as the entrance to the house. Next, there is a very cozy original living room with a fireplace, ideal for everyday use. To the left are the bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, with one of them suite in the master bedroom. Continuing, you access a landing converted into closets for the relief of the house. The jewel of the home is, without a doubt, its spectacular kitchen with an office, spacious and very well located, flooded with natural light. From here, you access an additional space of more than 60m2 that houses the laundry area, the pellet boiler and another living room or enjoyment area, creating a unique and versatile environment. Upon exiting to the backyard from the kitchen, a dream scenario is revealed: a magnificent built-in pool, barbecue area and a spectacular porch where you can enjoy great moments with family and friends. The house, located in the middle of the plot, stands out for its luminosity and open outdoor spaces. The qualities of the home include oak wood doors, wooden floors and porcelain stoneware, and a hydraulic pellet boiler that provides great energy efficiency and low consumption. The property is located in the Villas de Nuevo Baztán, offering fresh air with nearby roads and proximity to essential services. The bus stop at the door of the urbanization facilitates mobility. In short, this is a gem of a home where you will not need to invest anything to start enjoying. If you visit it, we are sure that you will fall in love with it and it could become your next home.
